title: Strengthening Clinical Practice Competencies: Knowledge Management and Collaboration Strategies for Corporate Innovation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic business administration and organizational behavior theory understanding
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three communication strategies for organizational knowledge creation
Learners can propose multidisciplinary collaboration approaches as project deliverables when designing knowledge management systems
Learners can explain the innovation knowledge ecosystem-building process in five stages through case analysis
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
